name: Free Will (ljbhnm)
description:
You are alive and willing to make your own guilt-free choices.

The game should work both in full screen and in vignette mode, but for a better visual experience, I recommend enjoying it full screen.

Designer：Min Ni  （ljbhnm@gmail.com）

music：Berliner Philharmoniker,Herbert von Karajan - Boléro

background：Hieronymus Bosch, The Garden of Earthly Delights 

picture：disco diffusion
